Patch Set 12: Code-Review+2
Change has been successfully merged
Can you please update the doxygen also? 😊
Ack
I don't think this is worth the complication. Use the macro when we can, if we can't, then so it if we copy/paste then hack in the bits that we need.
Ack
Yeah good point. Done.
See the comment on the AF_MCTP transport implementation.
Ack
If this is a clang-format change then it should be separated out.
Ack

You are trying to avoid adding one variable as the changing in line 175. But this can cause the confusing because tid is input of pldm_transport_send_recv_msg then become output of pldm_transport_recv_msg.
We should probably use a separate local and compare it to the passed value rather than overwrite the passed value.
Ah good idea!
is this something we planned to do in this commit ?
I don't see that it shouldn't work. Perhaps we could delete the comment?

Meta have confirmed this works in their testing:

> We have implemented the pldmtool with the transport APIs based on rkg's patches. We have also add a Meson option to choose between af-mtcp and mctp-demux, in order to avoid impacting ongoing projects.
> https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/libpldm/+/65675
> https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/pldm/+/65676
> And the code has tested communicating with bridge-IC and NIC.

https://discord.com/channels/775381525260664832/778790638563885086/1141327023839641640

So I think deleting the comment is enough.
Done
We tested the patch and it works good on our system.
